#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int w;
    cin>>w;
    while(w--){
        int n,i;
        cin>>n;
        int arr[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>arr[i];
        sort(arr,arr+n);
        if(arr[n-1]-arr[0]>=2)
            cout<<"BAD"<<endl;
        else cout<<"GOOD"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
